html:
SAN FRANCISCO, Nov 29 (Reuters) - A regional director for the U.S. National Labor Relations Board has issued a decision ordering a re-run of a union election at an Amazon.com AMZN.O facility in Alabama, a spokeswoman for the NLRB said on Monday.



(Reporting By Julia Love and Jeffrey Dastin; editing by Peter Henderson and Sonya Hepinstall)

(( peter.henderson@thomsonreuters.com ; 323 251 4827; ))

Keywords: AMAZON-LABOR/ (URGENT)
